sentences.en: Certainly those who spread the message of Godhead are most munificent.
sentences.cn: 的确,那些传播首神讯息的人们是最慷慨的.

sentences.en: Has the munificent technical force and the abundant economic basis.
sentences.cn: 有优厚的技术力量和雄厚的经济基础.

sentences.en: His father gave him a half - dollar and his mother a quarter and he thought them munificent.
sentences.cn: 他爸爸给了他半美元,他妈妈给了他0.25美元,他觉得他们很慷慨.

sentences.en: I am so happy to get munificent birthday presents from my friends.
sentences.cn: 我很高兴跟我朋友收到大量的生日礼物.

sentences.en: Our property was confiscated, and loaned back to us by a munificent state.
sentences.cn: 我们的财产全被充公了.而他们宽宏地把款子又借还给我们.

sentences.en: She exhorts me to accept that new position, although that position reward is not munificent.
sentences.cn: 她力劝我接受那个新职位, 虽然那职位报酬并不优厚.

sentences.en: What is more munificent, this reward all roles can enjoy to the account number under!
sentences.cn: 更为优厚的是, 该奖励对帐号下所有角色均能享受!

trans.tran_cn: （指送礼者）慷慨的，（指礼品）丰厚的
